ComicInfo.Title: Ken's Not a Hero; Chapter 5: Bart Curlish, Holistic Assassin
ComicInfo.Series: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency: The Salmon of Doubt
ComicInfo.Summary:
Plagued by nightmares of a life he never had, Dirk Gently discovers that a holistic detective can have more than one past, and theyâ€™re about to catch up with him! Featuring favorite characters from the original books as well as the cast from the TV series, including Samuel Barnett and Elijah Wood!
